title: Online Project-Based Language Learning Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Process Providing Real-Time Feedback Through Formative Assessment While Balancing Team Collaboration and Individual Learning in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can plan and execute team-based language projects using online collaboration tools within 5 days
Learners can submit individual assignments via a smartphone-based learning platform with ≥80% completion quality
Learners can improve the linguistic accuracy of team projects by 20% through peer assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
